On behalf of all the members and the management, we would like to extend our warmest welcome and good wishes!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These materials are aimed to provide you with additional information about the project and details about its internal processes to make your onboarding smoother. Please take a few moments to acquaint yourself with these helpful resources.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
